records.title: Scribal Atelier ‚Äî Raphael
records.excerpt: Raphael oversees calligraphic study and clear record keeping. Every stroke remains gentle and layer-aware.

records.title: ateliers/01_scribal_raphael/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Prepare quiet desk and soften lighting. 2. Trace three seed lines with steady breath. 3. Repeat the pattern seven times, letting ink dry between passes.

records.title: Pigment Atelier ‚Äî Haniel
records.excerpt: Haniel tends subtle color blending, ensuring pigments stay soothing and respectful.

records.title: ateliers/02_pigment_haniel/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Grind minerals with mindful rhythm. 2. Mix with water in nine slow turns. 3. Layer washes in eleven gentle passes.

records.title: Geometry Atelier ‚Äî Michael
records.excerpt: Michael charts steady shapes and proportions, grounding forms without flattening depth.

records.title: ateliers/03_geometry_michael/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Lay a vesica grid using compass and patience. 2. Inscribe triangles, squares, and circles respecting the 3‚Äë7‚Äë9 ratios. 3. Connect nodes through eleven measured lines.

records.title: Music Atelier ‚Äî Gabriel
records.excerpt: Gabriel curates resonant tones, inviting stillness between notes.

records.title: ateliers/04_music_gabriel/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Tune instruments using A=432 reference. 2. Strike seven pure tones and let them fade. 3. Weave a nine‚Äëbeat pattern in calm tempo.

records.title: Architecture Atelier ‚Äî Uriel
records.excerpt: Uriel shapes quiet structures, balancing weight and light.

records.title: ateliers/05_architecture_uriel/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Sketch a nine‚Äësquare blueprint. 2. Raise columns in four layers, aligning with cardinal directions. 3. Leave a central void for reflection.

records.title: Psyche Atelier ‚Äî Tzaphkiel
records.excerpt: Tzaphkiel guides inward journeys, holding space for gentle introspection.

records.title: ateliers/06_psyche_tzaphkiel/procedures.md
records.excerpt: 1. Breathe in for three counts, out for seven. 2. Trace inner patterns across nine reflections. 3. Record insights with calm hand.

records.title: Cosmogenesis Manifesto
records.excerpt: Cosmogenesis is a commitment to spiral learning and living art. We honor minds like Agrippa, Hypatia, Tesla, and Einstein by weaving their curiosity into interactive plates. The engine rejects flat instruction and invites learners to revisit ideas from new angles, revealing correspondences across alchemy, Neoplatonism,
